@correct_culture_primary_score = 100
@better_than_the_alternatives_score = 50
@always_primary_score = 1000
@never_primary_score = -1000

# EMPIRES

# special titles
k_papal_state = {
	color = { 255 249 198 }
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	landless = yes
	
	capital = c_roma
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

	male_names = { Alexander Anastasius Benedictus Caelestinus Callistus Clemens Eugenius Leo Gregorius Hadrianus Honorius Innocentius Ioannes Lucius Marinus Martinus Nicolaus Sergius Silvester Stephanus Urbanus Victor }
}

k_orthodox = {
	landless = yes
	capital = c_byzantion # Constantinople
	definite_form = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}

	#color = { 150 90 30 }
	color = { 183 60 155 }
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes
}

k_fashion = { # Kingdom of Fashion from Establish a New Fashion at Court decision
	color = { 140 45 165 }
	landless = yes
	destroy_on_succession = yes
	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no
	capital = c_lombardia # De-Jure capital has to be somewhere, will move as characters gain the title. Setting it to default at Milan for memes.

	no_automatic_claims = yes
	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
}

	de_jure_drift_disabled = yes

		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_north_germanic }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

############################################################################
e_britannia = {
	color = { 172 22 22 }
	
	capital = c_middlesex
	
	cultural_names = {
		name_list_pictish = cn_pictavia
		name_list_irish = cn_alba
		name_list_gaelic = cn_alba
	}
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_germanic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_goidelic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_brythonic }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
	
	k_england = {
		color = { 202 26 26 }
		
		capital = c_middlesex
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:english
						culture = culture:anglo_saxon
					}
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
		
		d_bedford = { # Essex
			color = { 241 15 15 }
			
			capital = c_middlesex
	
			cultural_names = {
				name_list_anglo_saxon = cn_east_seaxe
				name_list_old_saxon = cn_east_seaxe
			}

			c_middlesex = {
				color = { 230 5 5 }
	
				cultural_names = {
					name_list_anglo_saxon = cn_middle_seaxe
					name_list_old_saxon = cn_middle_seaxe
				}
				
				b_london = {
					province = 1527

					color = { 230 5 5 }

	k_ireland = {
		color = { 6 127 2 }
		
		capital = c_dublin # Dublin
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_goidelic }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:irish
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:gaelic
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

						culture = culture:cumbrian

				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score

	k_east_francia = {	#Germany
		color = { 160 160 160 }
		
		capital = c_frankfurt
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = { is_ai = yes }
				NOT = { exists = title:e_hre }
			}
		}

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:franconian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:franconian }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_central_germanic }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_roman_empire = {
	color = { 167 10 0 }

	capital = c_roma # Rome

	can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
}

e_byzantium = {
	color =  hsv{ 0.9 1 0.3 } #hsv{ 0.73 0.8 0.4 }  #hsv{ 0.77 0.8 0.6 } #{ 143 12 125 }
	
	capital = c_byzantion
	
	definite_form = yes
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
		custom_tooltip = {
			text = is_latin_emperor_tt
			NOT = {
				any_held_title = {
					this = title:e_latin_empire
				} 
			}
		}
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	k_cyprus = {
		color = { 215 215 20 }
		
		capital = c_nicosia
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = {
						OR = {
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_caucasian
						}
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

			name_list_turkish = cn_kibris
		}

			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = {
						OR = {
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_caucasian

	k_pontus = {
		color = { 205 130 85 }
		
		capital = c_trebizond
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:greek
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { culture = culture:greek }
					culture = {
						OR = {
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_byzantine
							has_cultural_pillar = heritage_caucasian
						}
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		de_jure_drift_disabled = yes
		always_follows_primary_heir = yes
		definite_form = yes

		ai_primary_priority = {

				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}

	k_old_armenia = {
		color = { 223 96 96 }
		
		#Here to prevent Armenia's regnal numbers getting messed up, as Bagratid Armenia counted its kings starting with Ashok I, and otherwise he'd be Ashok IV.

		capital = c_hayk # Ani
		
		can_create = { always = no } #For historical purposes only.
		no_automatic_claims = yes	#Otherwise the Bagrationi end up with weird claims in 867.

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:armenian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
	}
}

e_scandinavia = {
	color = { 62 122 189 }
	
	capital = c_skane #Lund - Archbishop seat of Scandinavia
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_north_germanic }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_balto_finnic }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

e_wendish_empire = {
	color = { 130 10 0 }
	
	capital = c_vidzeme # Riga
	
	definite_form = yes
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_baltic }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		else_if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_balto_finnic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

		color = { 110 80 168 }

		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:latgalian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						culture = culture:latgalian
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}
	}
}

e_west_slavia = { # West Slavs: Polish, Polabian, Czech, etc.
	color = { 130 20 50 }
	
	capital = c_krakowska # Krakowska
	
	definite_form = yes
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_slavic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

e_mongolia = {
	color = { 90 90 240 }
	
	capital = c_karakorum

	cultural_names = {
		name_list_uyghur = cn_great_uyghur
		name_list_yughur = cn_great_uyghur
		name_list_khitan = cn_jubu
	}

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_mongolic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

	color = { 175 237 135 }
	
	capital = c_bukhara
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_turkic }
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

e_france = {
	color = { 11 22 170 }
	
	capital = c_ile_de_france
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = culture:french
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = culture:norman
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
			}
			add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
		}
	}

	k_aquitaine = {
		color = { 101 50 253 }
		
		capital = c_bordeaux # Bordaeux
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				NOT = { has_title = title:k_france }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:occitan
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						culture = culture:norman
						culture = culture:french
					}
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

e_spain = {
	color = { 233 200 20 }
	
	capital = c_toledo # Toledo
	#can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

	cultural_names = {
		name_list_bedouin = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_butr = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_baranis = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_zaghawa = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_levantine = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_egyptian = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_maghrebi = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_andalusian = cn_isbaniya
		name_list_yemeni = cn_isbaniya
	}

	can_create = {
		custom_description = {
			text = form_hispania_must_end_struggle_trigger

			NOT = { exists = struggle:iberian_struggle }
		}

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
		
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}
	
	k_andalusia = {
		color = { 31 138 40 }
		
		capital = c_cordoba # Cordoba
		#can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

		cultural_names = {
			name_list_bedouin = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_baranis = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_butr = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_zaghawa = cn_al_andalus
			name_list_levantine = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_egyptian = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_maghrebi = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_andalusian = cn_al_andalus
	 		name_list_yemeni = cn_al_andalus
	 	}
		
		can_create = {
			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_arabic }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:andalusian
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
		}
		
		d_cordoba = {
			color = { 60 180 12 }
			
			capital = c_cordoba # Cordoba
			#can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

			cultural_names = {
				name_list_bedouin = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_baranis = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_butr = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_zaghawa = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_levantine = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_egyptian = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_maghrebi = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_andalusian = cn_qurtubah
				name_list_yemeni = cn_qurtubah
			}
			
			c_cordoba = {
				color = { 60 180 12 }
				can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

				cultural_names = {
					name_list_bedouin = cn_qurtubah
					name_list_baranis = cn_qurtubah

			if = {
				limit = {

				limit = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score

		color = { 150 120 5 }

		capital = c_navarra # Pamplona
		#can_be_named_after_dynasty = no

			trigger_if = {
				limit = {
					is_ai = yes
				}
				faith = { religion_tag = christianity_religion }
			}
		}
		
		ai_primary_priority = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = culture:basque
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_iberian }
				}
				add = @better_than_the_alternatives_score
			}
		}

				limit = {

			}
		}

			if = {

					culture = culture:guanches
				}
				add = @correct_culture_primary_score
			}

				limit = {
					NOT = {
						culture = culture:guanches
					}
				}

			}
		}

		custom_tooltip = {
			text = persian_struggle.tt.forbid_title_destruction
			NOT = { exists = struggle:persian_struggle }
		}
	}

	definite_form = yes

	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes

		if = {
			limit = {

			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

e_mali = {
	color = { 225 223 0 }
	
	capital = c_niani #	Niani
	
	can_create = {
		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}
	
	ai_primary_priority = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_west_african }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_sahelian }
					culture = { has_cultural_pillar = heritage_senegambian }
				}
			}
			add = @correct_culture_primary_score
		}
	}

	color = { 255 110 0 }

		rule_title_creation_imperial_power_projection_title_creation_trigger = yes
	}

	ai_primary_priority = {
		add = @always_primary_score
	}
}

# 867

d_nf_ampelas = { # Ampelas (Khaldia)
	color = { 100 100 100 }
	capital = c_byzantion

	definite_form = yes
	landless = yes
	ruler_uses_title_name = no
	always_follows_primary_heir = yes
	no_automatic_claims = yes
	noble_family = yes
	destroy_if_invalid_heir = yes

	ai_primary_priority = { add = @never_primary_score }
}
